name: Snucked
description:
this game was made for a game jam, its my first ever

Controls:

Mouse: 

left button: click where you want to place your player teleport points

right button: remove player teleport point by clicking on the point you want to remove

Ui: from top right:

play button: use it after placing your points

rewind button: reverse time with it to find best gap to teleport your player into

Circle button: enable and disable your enemies range display

restart button: restart the stage whenever you want

Keyboard: 

Esc button: open and close pause menu
